content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case in the county court dubrovnik the case started in 2009 and has been ongoing for 6 years and 8 months the final resolution is that the coownership of a personal automobile will be dissolved and the item will be sold through a public auction or another suitable means the funds obtained from the sale will be divided equally between the plaintiff and the defendant the plaintiffs claim for the dissolution of coownership of a business share in a company has been rejected the court has determined that the parties are coowners with a ½ share in the business share of the company the plaintiff is authorized to register the right in the book of business shares and dispose of the right the court has also authorized the sale of the business share and dismissed the plaintiffs claim the decision was made based on the provisions of the companies act and the property act

metadata.CASE_ID: Gž Ob-43/15, County Court Dubrovnik, 2nd instance, 27/01/2016
